alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 4:21AM CDT until October 27 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Elm Fork Trinity River Near Carrollton affecting Dallas County. Rowlett Creek Near Sachse affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Elm Fork Trinity River near Carrollton. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor flooding will occur upstream from the gage, near the city golf course. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 9.4 feet. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
